English.Text:
It will doubtless anger him to hear his orders were defied, but I stand by my decision. It may even please him to hear I have been wounded for my arrogance. It is likely my dress and decorations made me a conspicuous target, and I took musketfire to one side.
My arm still has full function— and my head is not half as foggy as the doctor thinks it might be— so I will continue to command until our operation here is concluded. La Corona may have suffered a defeat of magnitude today, but their flagship— the gargantuan Santíssima Vitória— managed to escape unscathed.
